Translations.Text: Wa 'Idh Qala 'Ibrahimu Li'abihi Wa Qawmihi 'Innani Bara'un Mimma Ta`buduna
Wa Ja`alaha Kalimatan Baqiyatan Fi `Aqibihi La`allahum Yarji`una
Bal Matta`tu Ha'uula' Wa 'Aba'ahum Hatta Ja'ahumu Al-Haqqu Wa Rasulun Mubinun
Wa Lamma Ja'ahumu Al-Haqqu Qalu Hadha Sihrun Wa 'Inna Bihi Kafiruna
Wa Qalu Lawla Nuzzila Hadha Al-Qur'anu `Ala Rajulin Mina Al-Qaryatayni `Azimin

Ahum Yaqsimuna Rahmata Rabbika Nahnu Qasamna Baynahum Ma`ishatahum Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Rafa`na Ba`đahum Fawqa Ba`đin Darajatin Liyattakhidha Ba`đuhum Ba`đaan Sukhriyaan Wa Rahmatu Rabbika Khayrun Mimma Yajma`una
Wa Lawla 'An Yakuna An-Nasu 'Ummatan Wahidatan Laja`alna Liman Yakfuru Bir-Rahmani Libuyutihim Suqufaan Min Fađđatin Wa Ma`arija `Alayha Yazharuna
Wa Zukhrufaan Wa 'In Kullu Dhalika Lamma Mata`u Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhiratu `Inda Rabbika Lilmuttaqina
